questions.question: How can I get started with TagEveryone?
questions.answer: You can start with TagEveryone for free. Just launch the bot on Telegram and follow the instructions to set up your first group. If you want advanced features, you can upgrade to a Premium plan anytime.

questions.question: How do I activate the Premium plan after purchase?
questions.answer: After completing the payment, you will receive an email with instructions on activating your Premium plan for a group of your choice. Follow the instructions to start using Premium features.

questions.question: Can I transfer my subscription to another group?
questions.answer: Yes, you can transfer your subscription to another group anytime. Simply follow the instructions in the dashboard to move the Premium plan to another group.

questions.question: Can I change plans anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can easily switch plans at any time. If you upgrade, the difference will be calculated proportionally based on the remaining subscription time.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for businesses. We use Stripe as a secure payment gateway.
